sentences: Olen armukade, et sul on nii hea töö.
Ta oli väga armukade oma naabri edule.
Armukade inimene ei saa kunagi rõõmu teiste õnnest.
context: The word 'armukade' is an adjective that describes someone who feels envy or jealousy towards others. It can be used to describe a person's emotional state when they desire what others have or feel resentful of others' success, possessions, or advantages.
